cards.effect:
Unblockable
While you control "Underground Mech Base", you may play this card from your discard zone as if it was in your hand. If you do, expel this card when it leaves the field.
Arrive â€“ You may discard a card. If you do, search your deck for an "Underground Mech Base" and put it into play, and if you do, you may also add a "Shard-Mecha" unit with cost (3) or less from your deck to your hand.

cards.name: Silver King's Overseer
cards.effect: Ruined - Search your deck for up to one "Silver King's Pawn" and put it into play. If your champion is "Metaial the Silver King" put two into play instead.

cards.name: Underlord of the Void Flame
cards.effect:
As an additional cost to play this card you may sacrifice a Fire unit with cost (2) or more. If you do, this card costs (2) less to play.
If you paid the additional cost to play this card, this card gains Quickness.

Instacast
Play only while you control a Fire unit. Neither player can add to the queue in response to this card. Expel target unit or augment, and if you do, it's owner draws a card.

Guardian, Target Attack

Target Attack
